module.name: Vilnius A/D module
module.description: With this VSCP module it is possible to measure voltage on four channels and to read/write two digital I/O

picture.description: Picture of the Accra counter module.

firmware.description: Firmware for the Vilnius A/D module for use with the VSCP Bootloader wizard.

manual.description: Manual for the Vilnius counter module.

reg.name: Module control
reg.description:
Module control register

 Bit 0 - Reserved.
 Bit 1 - Reserved.
 Bit 2 - Reserved.
 Bit 3 - Reserved.
 Bit 4 - Reserved.
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - Reserved.

reg.name: A/D channel 0 control register
reg.description:
Control register for A/D channel 0

 Bit 0 - Enable event on change.
 Bit 1 - Enable periodic events.
 Bit 2 - Enable stream events.
 Bit 3 - Enable low alarm.
 Bit 4 - Enable high alarm.
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - Enable counter.

bit.name: Enable channel
bit.description: Enable the A/D converter for channel 0.

reg.name: A/D channel 1 control register
reg.description:
Control register for A/D channel 0

 Bit 0 - Enable event on change.
 Bit 1 - Enable periodic events.
 Bit 2 - Enable stream events.
 Bit 3 - Enable low alarm.
 Bit 4 - Enable high alarm.
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - Enable counter.

bit.name: Enable channel
bit.description: Enable the A/D converter for channel 1.

reg.name: A/D channel 2 control register
reg.description:

 Bit 4 - Enable high alarm.

 Bit 6 - Reserved.

bit.name: Enable channel
bit.description: Enable the A/D converter for channel 2.

reg.name: A/D channel 3 control register

 Bit 0 - Enable event on change.
 Bit 1 - Enable periodic events.
 Bit 2 - Enable stream events.
 Bit 3 - Enable low alarm.
 Bit 4 - Enable high alarm.
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - Enable counter.

bit.name: Enable channel
bit.description: Enable the A/D converter for channel 3.

reg.name: I/O Channel Control Register
reg.description:
Control register for the two I/O channels.
 Set bit to zero for output and one for input.

 Bit 0 - Direction for I/O channel 0 (RC4). 0=output. 1=input.
 Bit 1 - Direction for I/O channel 0 (RC5). 0=output. 1=input.
 Bit 2 - Reserved.
 Bit 3 - Reserved.
 Bit 4 - Reserved.
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Reserved.
 Bit 7 - Reserved.

reg.name: I/O Channel Status Register
reg.description: Status register for the two I/O channels.

reg.name: VSCP event information for linearization channel 0.
reg.description:
VSCP event information for linearization channel 0.

 Bit 0 - Reserved
 Bit 1 - Reserved.
 Bit 2 - Reserved.
 Bit 3 - Unit.
 Bit 4 - Unit.
 Bit 5 - Reserved.
 Bit 6 - Class bit 8 (must currently always be set to zero).
 Bit 7 - Enable.

bit.name: Class bit 8
bit.description: Class bit 8. Must be zero at the moment.

reg.name: VSCP event information class channel 0.
reg.description: VSCP event information for linearization channel 0, VSCP Class low eight bits. Must currently be set to 10, CLASS1.MEASUREMENT.\n

reg.name: VSCP event information type channel 0.
reg.description: VSCP event information for linearization channel 0, VSCP Type.

bit.name: Alarm frequency 3
bit.description: Frequency alarm channel 3. The frequency is higher/lower then a limit value..

bit.name: Alarm frequency 2
bit.description: Frequency alarm channel 2. The frequency is higher/lower then a limit value.

bit.name: Alarm frequency 1
bit.description: Frequency alarm channel 1. The frequency is higher/lower then a limit value.

bit.name: Alarm frequency 0
bit.description: Frequency alarm channel 0. The frequency is higher/lower then a limit value.

bit.name: Alarm counter 3
bit.description: Counter alarm channel 3. The counter has passed a limit value.

bit.name: Alarm counter 2
bit.description: Counter alarm channel 2. The counter has passed a limit value.

bit.name: Alarm counter 1
bit.description: Counter alarm channel 1. The counter has passed a limit value.

bit.name: Alarm counter 0
bit.description: Counter alarm channel 0. The counter has passed a limit value.

action.name: Start counter
action.description: Set the enable bit and thereby start the counter given by the argument which should be a value of 0-3 representing counter0 - counter3.

action.name: Stop counter
action.description: Clear the enable bit and thereby stop the counter given by the argument which should be a value of 0-3 representing counter0 - counter3.

action.name: Clear counter
action.description: Clear the the value for the counter given by the argument which should be a value of 0-3 representing counter0 - counter3.

action.name: Reload counter
action.description: Load the reload value to the counter given by the argument which should be a value of 0-3 representing counter0 - counter3.

action.name: Count
action.description: Add or subtract one from a counter depening on its count direction setting.

event.name: Counter data
event.description: Count data steam event sent on regular intervals if activated. Coding: Integer. Unit: none.

data.name: Datacoding
data.description: Will contain 0b01100xxx where xxx is the counter (0-3/4-7) and where 0-3 is the counter 32-bit value and 4-7 is the 32-bits of the 64-bit counter value stored internally.

event.name: Alarm occured
event.description: If an alarm is armed this event is sent when it occurs and the corresponding alarm bit is set in the alarm register.

data.name: Zone
data.description: Is set to the zone for the module.

data.name: Sub zone
data.description: Sub zone for channel or sub zone for module if channel sub zone is zero.

event.name: Frequency measurement
event.description: Frequency measurement event sent on regular intervals if activated. Coding: 32-bit integer. Unit: Hertz.

data.name: Data coding
data.description: Datacoding: 0b01100xxx where xxx is the counter (0-3)

data.name: Frequency 32-bit value (MSB)
data.description: Frequency value as 32-bit floating point value with MSB in first byte.

data.name: Frequency 32-bit value
data.description: Frequency value as 32-bit floating point value with MSB in first byte.

data.name: Frequency 32-bit value
data.description: Frequency value as 32-bit floating point value with MSB in first byte.

data.name: Frequency 32-bit value (LSB)
data.description: Frequency value as 32-bit floating point value with MSB in first byte.

event.name: Measurement Event
event.description: Measurement values of all kinds can be sent as a result of linearization. For example can an input counting S0 pulses be translated to KWh and watt

data.name: Datacoding
data.description: Datacoding: Always as a 32-bit floating point value. 0b101yyxxx where yy is the unit and xxx is the counter (0-3)

data.name: 32-bit floating point value (MSB)
data.description: MSB of the 32-bit floating point value that has been calculated from the linearization equation.

data.name: 32-bit floating point value
data.description: 32-bit floating point value that has been calculated from the linearization equation.

data.name: 32-bit floating point value
data.description: 32-bit floating point value that has been calculated from the linearization equation.

data.name: 32-bit floating point value (LSB)
data.description: LSB of the 32-bit floating point value that has been calculated from the linearization equation.
